{{Description|A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.}}
'''Messenger'''{{Lang|zh=信使}} is a [[Liyue]] bow.

==Ascensions and Stats==
{{Weapon Ascensions and Stats
|ascendMat1 = Mist Veiled Lead Elixir
|ascendMat2 = Mist Veiled Mercury Elixir
|ascendMat3 = Mist Veiled Gold Elixir
|ascendMat4 = Mist Veiled Primo Elixir
|bossMat1   = Mist Grass Pollen
|bossMat2   = Mist Grass
|bossMat3   = Mist Grass Wick
|commonMat1 = Treasure Hoarder Insignia
|commonMat2 = Silver Raven Insignia
|commonMat3 = Golden Raven Insignia
}}

==Gameplay Notes==
* Numerous enemies' weak points will not allow this bow's passive to trigger. These include, but are not limited to, all enemies from [[Ruin Sentinel]] and [[Ruin Drake]] groups.

==Description==
It was said in days gone by,<br>
The people of Liyue passed messages by bow and arrow.<br>
"Wouldn't bystanders get hurt, you ask?"<br>
"Suffice to say, there's a good reason this bow is an antique..."<br>
The antique shop owner rubbed their chin and smiled.
